parameters.name: ChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the simple application servers. Valid values:

*   **PrePaid**: subscription
*   **PostPaid**: pay-as-you-go

parameters.name: Expired
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the instance has expired. Valid values:

*   **true**: The instance has expired.
*   **false**: The instance has not expired.

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description:
The IDs of the instances that you want to query.

>  If you want to specify multiple instance IDs, separate the instance IDs with commas (,). You can specify a maximum of 30 instance IDs in a single request.

parameters.name: InstanceStatus
parameters.description:
The state of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Normal**: The instance is normal.
*   **Creating**: The instance is being created.

>  For more information about instance states, see [Instance states and impacts](~~200740~~).

parameters.name: NetworkType
parameters.description:
The network type of the instance. Default value: VPC. Valid values:

*   **VPC** (default)

Valid values:

*   CLASSIC
*   VPC

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the instance list. Start value: 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 30.

parameters.name: PrivateIp
parameters.description: The private IP address of the instance. This parameter is deprecated.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the instance resides.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID. You can leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The keyword that you want to use for fuzzy match. The keyword can be a part of an instance name or an instance ID.
